settings.title: Do you offer white glove delivery?
settings.content: We do not offer white-glove delivery through Amsterdam Modern, however we are happy to assist in connecting clients with 3rd party local delivery drivers and shipping companies. Please see our Shipping & Delivery Policy for more information, or reach out to info@amsterdammodern.com for assistance on a specific product.

settings.title: Do you offer shipping?
settings.content: We will pack & ship boxable items that can be sent via traditional mail carriers (shipping fee charged separately, please email info@amsterdammodern before placing your order online if you are looking for a delivery option). For larger/more delicate items, we can provide assistance in connecting clients with 3rd party delivery companies (quote provided separately) and/or accommodate pickups for client-arranged delivery. Please see our Shipping & Delivery Policy for more information, or reach out to info@amsterdammodern.com for assistance on a specific product.

settings.title: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.content:
We are happy to assist in connecting clients with 3rd party international shipping companies. Please see our Shipping & Delivery Policy for more
information, or reach out to info@amsterdammodern.com for assistance on a specific product.

settings.title: How can I request a shipping or delivery quote?
settings.content:
Please email info@amsterdammodern.com with
a) product info
b) yourname and full delivery address including zip code
c) information on delivery type, including whether it will be curbside delivery / stairs / elevator etc
d) time-sensitivity should you need delivery by a specific date

settings.title: Do you offer a trade pricing/designer discount?
settings.content:
We do! Members of the trade (interior designers and decorators) can receive 10% off– so long as the purchase is directly related to their work. California sales tax is always included unless the purchase is for resale. To qualify as tax-exempt, you must provide Amsterdam Modern with a valid resale license in the state of California. Apply for a wholesale
account here.

settings.title: Do you offer measurements?
settings.content: We have measurements under the specifications dropdown for each product. Measurements are taken to give you a sense of volume, to help when planning a space, and are therefore more general. Measurements are taken in the following order: W x D x H. In some cases, we have multiple heights (for example: width x depth x seat height / arm height / chair height). Please inquire if you want more specific measurements.

settings.title: Can I try out the furniture in my home before purchasing?
settings.content: Absolutely! We offer a 24-hour memo free of charge. Visit our Memo & Rentals Policy page for more information.

settings.title: Can I rent your furniture (events, shoots, etc.)?
settings.content: Definitely! Visit our Memo & Rentals Policy page for more information.

settings.title: Can I use your pieces in a photoshoot or home staging project?
settings.content:
Absolutely! Visit our Memo & Rentals Policy page for more information.
For special collaborations, contact us at info@amsterdammodern.com.

settings.title: Do I need an appointment to visit your showroom?
settings.content: Appointments are preferred, but walk-ins are welcome! We invite you to make an appointment online (you may also indicate specify item(s) you’d like to view through this link) or feel free to call 213-221-7380 to schedule a visit. Walk-ins are always welcome, just ring the doorbell when you arrive. We look forward to seeing you!

settings.title: Do you buy furniture or accept trade?
settings.content: On occasion... it depends how full our inventory is! Send us an email with product information and some photos and we’ll get back to you ASAP.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.content:
Amsterdam Modern accepts the following payment methods:
–Major Credit/Debit Cards: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
–PayPal
–Apple Pay
–ACH-Enabled US Bank Accounts + Wire Transfers (available on orders
of $5,000 or more)
–Cash

settings.title: Can I purchase pieces online?
settings.content: Yes! If you are arranging delivery/pickup yourself, you can go ahead and purchase online and indicate ‘local pickup’ at checkout. If you are interested in purchasing an item and need a delivery quote or need help arranging shipping/delivery, please email us with the product info + your delivery address before purchasing through our website so that we can help coordinate!

settings.title: I want to work with you!
settings.content: Great, let’s chat! Let us know what you have in mind and we’ll connect you with the right team: info@amsterdammodern.com.

settings.title: Are you hiring?
settings.content: Feel free to introduce yourself and drop a resume over to: hey@amsterdammodern.com

settings.title: Simple checkout
settings.text: Our secure checkout is quick and easy to use.

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.text: Have questions? Get in touch with us at anytime.
